```{r data generation, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}
library(exams)
library(gmp)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(plyr)
library(latex2exp)
typ <- match_exams_device()
#--------------------------------------------------------
num<-c(sample(2:100 ,1))
num

pipadf <- count(as.numeric(factorize(num)))
pipadf <- pipadf[order(pipadf$freq), ]
pipadf
pipa <- as.numeric(factorize(num))
pipa
kuantos <- length(pipa)
kuantos <- kuantos + 1
kuantos
pases <- length(pipadf$freq)
pases
x <- 1
nuevovektor <- vector()

while(x <= pases){
  unovek <- rep(pipadf[x,1],pipadf[x,2])
  nuevovektor <- c(nuevovektor,unovek)
  x <- x+1
}

nuevovektor <- c(nuevovektor,1)
nuevovektor

i <- 1
fderaiz <- vector()
dderaiz <- vector()

while(i <= kuantos-1){
  
  if(nuevovektor[i]==nuevovektor[i+1]){
    x <- nuevovektor[i]
    fderaiz <- c(fderaiz, x)
    i <- i+2
  }else {
    x <- nuevovektor[i]
    dderaiz <- c(dderaiz, x)
    i <- i+1
  }
}

fderaiz
dderaiz

sinrad <- prod(fderaiz)
sinrad

conrad <- prod(dderaiz)
conrad

if(sinrad == 1){
  sinrad <- paste("")
}

if(conrad == 1){
  conrad <- paste("")
}

TeX("$\\alpha$")
TeX("The ratio of 1 and 2 is $\\frac{1}{2}$")
TeX(r'($\alpha  x^\alpha$, where $\alpha \in 1\ldots 5$)')

a <- 1:100
pepun <- plot(a, a^2, xlab=TeX("$\\alpha$"), ylab=TeX("$\\alpha^2$"))
pepun
plot(TeX(r'(A $\LaTeX$ formula: $\frac{2hc^2}{\lambda^5}\frac{1}{e^{\frac{hc}{\lambda k_B T}} - 1}$)'), cex=2, main="")
```
